EmailTemplate.subject: One last step to debt relief
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Congratulations!
You recently completed the first step in the process of applying for assistance with your for-profit debt on IAVA's website. The answers your provided indicate that you are eligible for the scholarship being offered in partnership with IAVA, Scholarship America, and The Kisco Foundation.
There's one last step -- it looks like you haven't completed the second set of questions, which are required for final submission into the pool of eligible particpants. If you are still interested in the award and would like to remain eligible, please complete the second set of questions, which can be found here: http://iava.org/veterans-student-loan-relief-fund
You can save your progress and resume later if you wish, or can continue working on an already saved application from the above link by clicking in the upper right hand corner and entering in your login information.
If you have any questions or need assistance completing the form, please feel free to reach out to me personally at ryan@iava.org or by calling 917-326-3189.
Best of luck in the application process!
Ryan Weemer OIF Veteran, USMC 2001-2005 Education Case Manager Iraq and Afghanistan Veterans of America (IAVA)
